message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product, and I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love the value it brings to your business.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $8,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $8,000. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm still confident it's worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  While I think the product is good, $10,500 is still a bit more than I'm looking to spend. Would you consider $9,000?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $10,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and quality.
